=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Chicago Med: Season Three [DVD]
Review Date: 2019/10/27
Store: Colin Donnell  (Actor),     Nick Gehlfuss  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles
Product Description: ["As the courageous team of doctors, nurses and staff of Chicago Med deal with the pulse-pounding pandemonium of the emergency room, heart-wrenching drama impacts them both professionally and personally. With lives on the line every day, the ED team finds themselves on an emotional thrill ride through the day-to-day chaos of the hospital that gets Chicago's most difficult and challenging cases. From Primetime Emmy Award-winning executive producer Dick Wolf (Law & Order) come all 20 groundbreaking Season Three episodes to watch back-to-back and uninterrupted."]
Average Rating: 4.8

reference_summary:
The Amazing Race
Unscripted, Drama, Sports, Adventure
['Eleven teams will embark on the adventure of a lifetime on the new season of The Amazing Race. Phil Keoghan is the host. This season, the multi-Emmy Award-winning series sends 11 new Teams on a Race around the globe, making first time visits to exotic locations such as Indonesia, Malawi, Belgium and Denmark.']

Five Stars
Gotham Season 4 [Blu-ray]
Benjamin McKenzie  (Actor),     Donal Logue  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
['After completing his training with the Temple Shaman (guest star Raymond J. Barry) and Ra’s al Ghul (new series regular Alexander Siddig), Bruce Wayne steps into the role of the protector of Gotham City with the help of his ever-faithful butler Alfred Pennyworth (Pertwee) and quiet support of Lucius Fox (Chalk), while building up his public persona of carefree socialite to avoid any suspicion among Gotham’s citizens. As the city sinks deeper into chaos, GOTHAM continues to follow the evolving stories of the city’s most malevolent villains: The Penguin (Taylor), Edward Nygma/The Riddler (Smith), Selina Kyle/the future Catwoman (Bicondova), Barbara Kean (Richards), Tabitha Galavan (Lucas) and Butch Gilzean (Powell).']

Chicago Fire: Season Six [DVD]
Jesse Spencer  (Actor),     Taylor Kinney  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles
['With the fate of several of the squad hanging in the balance, season six of Chicago Fire reignites in a blaze of uncertainty. As the brave firefighters, rescue squad and paramedics deal with the aftermath of each fire they face – more hot romances, pulse-pounding action and fiery drama unfold every step of the way. From Primetime Emmy Award-winning executive producer Dick Wolf (Law & Order) comes all 23 explosive episodes presented back-to-back for uninterrupted viewing.Bonus Content:', 'Disc 4 - Chicago Fire Season Six:', 'Cross Over Episode: Chicago PD 5x16 "Profiles"', 'Cross Over Episode: Chicago PD 5x16 "Profiles"']

**User Profile Summary:**

- **Viewing Preferences:** Enjoys unscripted content, particularly reality and adventure genres, alongside scripted dramas that feature strong storytelling and character development. Recent engagement with a dramatic medical series showcases an appreciation for high-stakes narratives and emotional depth.
- **Interest in Competition:** Shows a preference for competitive formats like races or challenges, indicating a thrill-seeking aspect in selected content.
- **Travel Enthusiasm:** Appreciates shows that feature diverse and exotic global locations, broadening their viewing experiences.
- **Positive Engagement:** Exhibits a high level of enthusiasm and satisfaction, consistently giving five-star ratings. Recent interactions reflect continued dedication to engaging narratives, especially in the realm of intense drama.
- **Familiarity with Series:** Likely a dedicated viewer of long-running shows that build on consistent themes and character arcs, indicating an investment in both contemporary hits and established favorites.
- **Genre Exploration:** Demonstrates interest in various genres, including drama and adventure, showcasing broad taste that encompasses both reality-based shows and scripted narratives with compelling character dynamics.

**Keywords:** Unscripted, drama, adventure, competition, global travel, satisfaction, dedicated viewer, scripted narratives, intense storytelling. 

The user's consistent engagement with intense dramas, particularly those featuring medical themes, highlights their investment in emotionally charged narratives while maintaining a love for adventurous, competition-driven content.
